name: s3-replicator
description: Replicates S3 objects to configured bucket

scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-template.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --stack-name dev-s3-replicator-$USER --parameter-overrides sourceBucket=$SOURCE_BUCKET destBucket=$DEST_BUCKET

author: Evan Chiu <evan@evanchiu.com>
